title: (x) Oracle logo - custom designed {Marten F}
content:
Anyone knows the font Oracle uses for their logo, or a font that looks similar?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230511im_/http:/typophile.com/files/10goca_logo_6386.gif)
author: maxmaxi

comments.content: Similar yet different, but if you're feeling Star Trekkish, you could go with [Galaxy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230511/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/galaxy/)...

I think this is custom work. You can find a SVG version of the logo at the [Wikipedia page on Oracle Corporation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230511/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oracle_Corporation) for reference...
Can't find it, and not 100% sure but I think [I've seen that face before](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230511/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=zZRTbjpFCF4).
